thread.section_title: Blurb Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blurb | www.blurb.com
thread.title: Marcus Elsum

author: Marcus Elsum
title: Marcus Elsum
text: I recently re-engaged with Blurb and moved from their Booksmart program to Bookwright. Once I got the workflow on selecting photos on the mac them importing into Bookwright - the process of creating a great photobook was smooth. Pricing is reasonable and production quality high. I had to contact customer services on a pricing question and they were personal, prompt and friendly. Highly recommended!
